title-group.article-title: The Theory of the Firm and Finance Theory

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1997 Journal of Financial Education, Jean L. Heck

abstract.p: Students often have difficulty understanding the relationship between economics and finance. This article addresses the problem by offering an approach to help students understand the linkage between economics and finance. A successfully used teaching example is presented that describes how microeconomic theory and finance theory are linked together, along with a discussion of the importance of teaching this linkage.
